thread.title: Donald Trump’s Message on Crime Draws Some Pushback - WSJ
thread.title_full: Donald Trump’s Message on Crime Draws Some Pushback - WSJ

author: Beth Reinhard
title: Donald Trump’s Message on Crime Draws Some Pushback - WSJ
text:
Donald Trump’s Message on Crime Draws Some Pushback Stepped-up enforcement and penalties would defy many conservatives By @bethreinhard Updated Feb. 26, 2017 3:15 p.m. ET 
President Donald Trump frequently depicts a nation suffering from a bloody crime wave—at times citing incorrect data or unverifiable accounts—raising the prospect of increased prosecutions and tougher penalties. That message is splitting the law-enforcement community and would contradict a growing consensus in his own party around policies aimed at reducing prison populations. 
Several new executive actions by the administration could open the door to stepped-up enforcement and stronger penalties aimed at what it sees as... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
